name: Add Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet rows for new Order Desk orders imported
description: Every time a new order is imported into your Order Desk, Make will automatically add it to your Microsoft 365 Excel as a worksheet row. Here's the [sheet](https://dnu-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/ivanov_d_donnu_edu_ua1/EZnku_Raiv1Ejafy0tFO_FIBeni9ND9yRr8vSkfeB-eeDw?e=8Z9ohd) used in this scenario.
